articles.title: Indian-American Abhimanyu Mishra becomes youngest Grandmaster in chess history - Yahoo India News
articles.description: The 12-year old Indian-American broke Sergey Karjakin's record that has stood for 19 years.
articles.content:
Abhimanyu Mishra is now the youngest Grandmaster in history. (Pic courtesy: Twitter)
Indian-American prodigy Abhimanyu Mishra on Wednesday became the youngest ever chess Grandmaster after he scored … [+639 chars]

articles.title: Pennsylvania court overturns Bill Cosby's sexual assault conviction - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Pennsylvania's highest court threw out Bill Cosby's sexual assault conviction and released him from prison Wednesday in a stunning reversal of fortune for the comedian once known as “America's Dad,” ruling that the prosecutor who brought the case was bound by…
